item.title: Buffalo Chicken Sandwich
item.description: Ingredients 600g diced poached chicken 1 stalk celery, cut into 1/4-inch dice 4 spring onions, trimmed and thinly sliced 1 1/2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh tarragon or fresh dill 2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley 180g mayonnaise 2 teaspoons strained freshly squeezed lemon juice 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard 2 teaspoons salt Freshly ground black pepper 8 slices thick-cut brown bread of your choice Sandwich fillings of your choice (crispy smoked bacon, vine-ripened tomatoes and lettuce) Method In a mixing bowl, toss together the chicken, celery, spring onions and herbs.
